name: alsyl
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: alanimi(s0, wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w2)))

comment: Universally quantified and uncurried (imported) form of syllogism. Theorem *10.3 in [WhiteheadRussell] p. 150. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
